language.item: Your user account has been locked. To reactivate it, please use the "forgot password" function, to receive a new password.
Allow users to override the default language
Allow users to override the number of displayed resultsets per page
If you don't want to display a certain profile field, just untick the respective field.
While sending the E-mail with your new password an error has occured.
Please enter your user name or E-mail address of your user account.
An E-mail with your new password has been successfully sent.
Please type in a valid birthday and how it should look like.
Please type in a valid ICQ number.
The MSN-Account you have entered does not match the format of an e-mail address.
With this module you can administer the users.
Either the user name or the password is wrong.
While creating the user account an error has occured.
The user account has been created successfully.
Please select an access level for this user.
Please select whether users should be allowed to register on this website.
Please select whether users should be allowed to override the number of displayed resultsets per page.
Please select the language in which you want to see the website.
Please select whether to users should be allowed to override the default language.
Please select whether the user should be a super user or not.
Please either enter the E-mail address or the user name you used with the registration.
Either the password is empty or there is a typo in the repetition.
There is already an user account registered with the same E-mail address.
There is already an user account registered with the same user name.
There is no user profile registered with the typed in user name respectively the typed in E-mail address.
The requested user profile doesn't exists.
The registration for new users is currently diabled!
In total there are %d users registered on this Website.
